Found the article. It's located at:

**`content/posts/what-happened-to-the-abolish-holyrood-party.md`**

The article is titled "What happened to the Abolish Holyrood Party?" and was published on September 23, 2025. It explains why the party registration couldn't continue for 2026, covering:

1. **The Campaign Name** — The Electoral Commission wouldn't allow "Holyrood" in the party name, and issues with the Abolish The Scottish Parliament Party (ATSPP)
2. **Funding the Campaign** — They didn't meet the minimum funding target of £3,000/month

The article is currently set to `draft = false`, so it's published. It's accessible at `/articles/what-happened-to-the-abolish-holyrood-party/` on your local Hugo site.
